name: Prefer not using deprecated methods, constructors, fields, type or packages
Ensure you don't use officially jQuery deprecated methods
Ensure you don't use jQuery $.cookie because it is deprecated
Ensure you no longer us Buffer() function or new Buffer() constructor because they are deprecated
Use XmlReader instead of XmlTextReader since it is deprecated and may lead to security issues
Ensure that you use CLOB, NCLOB or BLOB datatypes in tables instead of LONG or LONG RAW as the latter are deprecated
